user_query: I'm planning a trip to Barcelona and I want to learn some basic phrases in Spanish. Can you provide me with a list of supported languages from the Linguin AI API? It would also be great if you could fetch some tweets about Barcelona from the Sentimental Analysis_v2 API to get a sense of the city's vibe.

TaskList.description: Fetch the list of supported languages from the Linguin AI API.
Fetch tweets about Barcelona using the Sentimental Analysis_v2 API.
